mapper.insert: insert into db_unitepurchase (SEQUENCEID, SKU, MAINSKU, GROUPID, FLAG, ORDERNUM, COSTPRICE, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATETIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5 ) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
mapper.update: update db_unitepurchase set SKU = #{sku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MAINSKU = #{mainsku,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GROUPID = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERNUM = #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, COSTPRICE = #{costprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATETIME = #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SKU, MAINSKU, GROUPID, FLAG, ORDERNUM, COSTPRICE, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATETIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5 from db_unitepurchase where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select SEQUENCEID, SKU, MAINSKU, GROUPID, FLAG, ORDERNUM, COSTPRICE, OPER, OPERTIME, CREATETIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5 from db_unitepurchase
